content:
Sure, here are 15 more popular fashion styles for men in their late 30s:

31. Eclectic: This style is a combination of different influences and features clothing such as vintage pieces, ethnic prints, and unique accessories.
32. Tropical: This style is inspired by tropical and resort wear, featuring clothing such as bright colors, bold prints, and lightweight fabrics.
33. Street-Elegant: This style combines streetwear and elegant fashion, featuring clothing such as designer denim, tailored blazers, and luxury sneakers.
34. Japanese Streetwear: This style is inspired by Japanese street fashion and features clothing such as oversized silhouettes, avant-garde designs, and bold graphics.
35. Street-Athletic: This style combines streetwear and athletic wear, featuring clothing such as track pants, oversized t-shirts, and high-top sneakers.
36. Street-Heritage: This style combines streetwear and traditional fashion, featuring clothing such as tweed jackets, corduroy pants, and oversized scarfs.
37. Street-Workwear: This style combines streetwear and traditional workwear, featuring clothing such as denim overalls, chore coats, and heavy boots.
38. Street-Vintage: This style combines streetwear and vintage fashion, featuring clothing such as vintage denim, oversized t-shirts, and vintage sneakers.
39. Street-Outdoor: This style combines streetwear and outdoor fashion, featuring clothing such as flannel shirts, cargo pants, and hiking boots.
40. Street-Futuristic: This style combines streetwear and futuristic fashion, featuring clothing such as metallic fabrics, oversized silhouettes, and bold colors.
41. Street-Tech: This style combines streetwear and technology-inspired fashion, featuring clothing such as technical fabrics, performance wear, and futuristic designs.
42. Street-Sustainable: This style combines streetwear and sustainable fashion, featuring clothing such as organic cotton, recycled materials, and sustainable production methods.
43. Street-Normcore: This style combines streetwear and normcore fashion, featuring clothing such as basic t-shirts, khakis, and white sneakers.
44. Street-Retro: This style combines streetwear and retro fashion, featuring clothing such as vintage denim, retro graphic tees, and vintage sneakers.
45. Street-Rock: This style combines streetwear and rock-inspired fashion, featuring clothing such as leather jackets, band t-shirts, and boots.

These are just some examples of fashion styles for men in their late 30s, but there are many other styles and variations that can be considered. Remember that fashion is a constantly evolving and changing, so don't be afraid to experiment and try new things. It's also important to choose styles that fit your personal style, profession and lifestyle.
